name: fisherman
Str_thoughts: As a fisherman, having a good amount of strength would be necessary for tasks like hauling in nets or handling a fishing rod, so I assigned a value slightly above average.
Dex_thoughts: Dexterity is important for tasks like casting lines or handling slippery fish, so a middle average would be fitting for a fisherman.
Con_thoughts: While it's likely he has a good constitution to endure long days outdoors, the information given doesn't suggest an exceptional level.
Int_thoughts: A fisherman's intelligence doesn't necessarily need to be high, but there is likely some knowledge about fish behavior and weather patterns, so an average rating is appropriate.
Wis_thoughts: Fishermen often require wisdom to understand the environment and patterns of nature, which is why I assigned a slightly above average value.
Cha_thoughts: Charisma may not be crucial in his day-to-day tasks, so I assigned a slightly below average score, although it can be beneficial in selling fish or interacting with others.
Emp_thoughts: The profile doesn't provide information suggesting strong empathy, but as a fisherman, interacting with nature requires some understanding, warranting a slightly below average score.
MusicalAbility_thoughts: There's no indication of musical talent in the brief description provided, so I gave this a low score.
CookingAbility_thoughts: While cooking ability isn't directly mentioned, being a fisherman might involve knowing some basic fish preparation, hence a slightly below average rating.
CodingAbility_thoughts: There is no mention of any technical skills like coding, suggesting a very low rating.
Fashion_thoughts: The description fixates on a green outfit, suggesting functionality over style, hence a low fashion rating.
FishingAbility_thoughts: Fishing is the most significant part of the character description, so it warrants a high score for fishing ability.
